prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a streamlined body and large fins.
Generate a serene creature that glides gracefully through the ocean waves.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a manta ray, with soft colors and gentle features.
Imagine a friendly aquatic Pokemon that enjoys playing with trainers in the sea.
Design a Pokemon with a unique swimming technique and beautiful blue patterns.
Show me a Pokemon that can soar through water and air with ease.
I want a calming Pokemon that embodies the tranquility of the ocean depths.
